pages.text: se balabe -- ''haya amara aphasosa! Ami yadi agabaratama amara e'i jibanera jan'ya!’’
Kinta se'idina ke'u'i tamra sastira mato sasti dite parabe na
ara na parabe ke'u bamdhate tamra bamdhanera mato.
Ohe prasanta prana
tomara prabhura kache phire eso santasta haye, -- santosabhajana haye
tarapara prabesa karo amara bandadera dale
ara prabesa karo amara jannate.’’
Na, ami sapatha karachi e'i nagarera name
ara tumi baidha thakabe e'i nagarite
ara janmadatara, ara yadera tini janma diyechena.
Amara niscaya'i manusake srsti karechi sramanirbhara kare.
Se ki bhabe ye tara upare ke'u kono ksamata rakhate pare na
se bale -- ''ami pracura sampada nihsesa karechi.’’
Se ki bhabe ye take ke'u dekhate pabe na
amara ki tara jan'ya baniye di'i ni duti cokha
ara ekati jihaba o duti thomta
ara amara ki take duti patha'i dekha'i ni
kinta se urdhbagami patha dharate caya ni.
Ara kemana kare tomake bojhano yabe ki se'i urdhbagami patha
dasake mukti de'oya
athaba akalera dine khabara de'oya
nikata samparkera etimake
athaba dhuloya lutano nihsbake.
Tahale se tadera antarbhukta yara imana eneche, ara parasparake adhyabasaya abalanbane pracesta kare o eke-an'ye daya-daksinyera prayasa calaya.
Era'i hacche daksinapanthiyadera dalabhukta.
Ara yara amadera banisamuhe abisbasa posana kare tara'i hacche bamapanthiyadera dalabhukta.
Tadera upare aguna acchadita kare ra'ibe.
